wordpressPage.title: Useful Schools Work Links
wordpressPage.content:
Here are a few links to useful schools work websites. If you’d like your site to be included please contact us.

Schools Work – Schools work offers a whole range of schools work resources including assembly ideas and resources for small groups.

Schools Live – The schools work resource from scripture union with some useful resources for Christian groups

Prayer Spaces in Schools – A fantastic resource of workshops that encourage young people to explore faith that even have SEAL outcomes on! Well worth a look!

Assemblies – A selection of primary and secondary assembly resources

YFC Schools Connection – A selection of assemblies and lesson plans from Youth for Christ

TLG (The Lighthouse Group) –
Reaching to young people in educational crisis

Christian Resources for Schools – This site has a selection of assemblies and Christian Union plans plus some multi-media from a schools worker based in a multi-faith school.
